renderpass.code:
#define H(p)      fract(sin((p)*mat2(127.1,311.7, 269.5,183.3)) *43758.5453123)
#define T(t,s)  ( t < 1. ? t-s : fract(t-s) )                   // init vs steady rain

void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 u ) 
{
    vec2  R = iResolution.xy;
    float N = 2., w = N/R.y, t = iTime/10.,
          l = 9., d,a;
    vec2  U = w* ( u+u - R ), D,P,_P,
          I = floor(U), F = fract(U)-.5;
          
    O = .9*texture(iChannel0, 2.*u/R);                          // background
    
    int i=-1,k=0;
    for( ; k < 9; k++ )                                         // check neighbor cells
        D = vec2( k%3, k/3 )-1.,
        T( t , H(I+D+.2).x ) > 0.                               // proba of splat
          ? P = F - D - H(I+D),
            d = dot(P,P),
            d < l ? l = d, _P=P,i=k : k :k;                     // keep closest splat id
        
    i >= 0
      ? a = atan(_P.y,_P.x),                                    // restore closest splat
        D = vec2( i%3, i/3 )-1.,
        F = H(I+D+.6)*.1, P = H(I+D+.4)*6.28,
        l = length(_P) - .1-F.x  -.03* cos(3.*a+P.x) -.03* (1.+3.*F.y)*cos(7.*a+P.y), // splat shape
        O = mix(O, vec4(.8,.8,1,1), .4* smoothstep(2.*min(fwidth(l),w),0., l )     // draw splat
                                      * smoothstep(1.,0.,T( t , H(I+D+.2).x ) ) )  // fade over time
      : O;
    
}
